pageProps.title: The Importance of B Vitamins in Nerve Health: Understanding Nutritional Deficiencies in Sciatica and Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
pageProps.metaDesc:
Nerve pain and numbness can be incredibly debilitating, affecting both physical and mental wellbeing. Sciatica and carpal tunnel syndrome are two of the most common types of nerve conditions, and they can be caused or worsened by nutritional deficiencies.



In this article, we’ll explore the role of B vitamins in nerve health, focusing on the three most common nutritional deficiencies in sciatica and carpal tunnel syndrome: B1, B6, and B12.
